experience.title: Data Science Internship, American Airlines
description: Leveraged predictive analytics to model factors driving email unsubscribes, addressing a $140K revenue impact

Analyzed interpretable classifiers (Logistic Regression, Random Forests, CatBoost) and deployed an optimized model projected to reduce unsubscribes by 30%
